channel.title: DNS Record :: Internship Report
channel.description: GIAI ĐOẠN 5: TRỎ DOMAIN CHÍNH THỨC (DNS RECORD) Vào Route 53 > Hosted zones > sgutodolist.com. Tạo Record cho Root domain: Click Create record. Record name: (để trống). Type: A. Alias: Yes (Gạt nút sang phải). Route traffic to: Alias to CloudFront distribution. Choose distribution: Chọn cái CloudFront domain (ví dụ d123...cloudfront.net). Click Create records.
